name: MADE N FLIGHT (DEMO)
description:
A demo of my game "MADE N FLIGHT" (yes that's a pun) from 2019. This game is still in development and if you would like to follow along check out my Twitter https://twitter.com/MoonSonStudios1 

This demo is in no way an accurate representation of the final game and has already changed a lot since 2019.

Controls: 

W A S D keys to move, "SPACE" to jump, Drag Mouse to look around outside of the aircraft. To enter the Aircraft, jump onto the wing and Press the "F" key while looking at the seat. To exit the Aircraft, Press "F" again.

When in Aircraft use "W" to increase throttle and "S" to decrease throttle. "A" and "D" Roll the aircraft, "Q" and "E" control the Yaw (rudder) of the Aircraft.

Push Mouse Forward To nose the aircraft down, and Pull Mouse Backward to nose the aircraft up. Moving the mouse Left or Right will also Roll the aircraft.

Left Mouse Button with Fire the Guns. Think of them as airsoft guns. They don't really do much.

The "ESC" key will open the pause menu, where you can exit the game or return to main menu.
